Uses of Interface
sep.tinee.net.message.Message

  • Packages that use Message 
    Package Description
    sep.tinee.net.channel
    Provides ClientChannel for you to establish a TCP connection and communicate messages with an instance of Server.
    sep.tinee.net.message
    A base interface and concrete classes for messages understood and communicated by instances of Server.

    • Uses of Message in sep.tinee.net.channel

      Methods in sep.tinee.net.channel that return Message 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Message ClientChannel.receive()
      Receive a message from the server specified at channel creation.
      Methods in sep.tinee.net.channel with parameters of type Message 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ClientChannel.send(Message msg)
      Send a message to the server specified at channel creation.

    • Uses of Message in sep.tinee.net.message

      Classes in sep.tinee.net.message that implement Message 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Bye
      A BYE message: Tell a Server instance to terminate this communication session.
      class  Push
      A PUSH message: tells a Server instance to append a list of tines from a user to each (possibly new) tag in the set of tags.
      class  ReadReply
      A READ-REPLY message: the server reply to a READ request: the list of lines recorded by the server for the specified tag, listed from the specified index.
      class  ReadRequest
      A READ message: tells a Server instance to return the currently recorded (sub)list of tines for a given tag, as listed from the specified index (inclusive, starting from index 0).
      class  ShowReply
      A SHOW-REPLY message: the server reply to a SHOW request: the set of tags explicitly recorded by the server.
      class  ShowRequest
      A SHOW message: tells a Server instance to return the currently recorded set of ticket tags and creators (user names).
